name: Knife Hit
shortDescription: An addictive, one-tap arcade game where you must precisely throw knives into a rotating log or unique boss target without hitting any existing blades.
fullDescription:
Knife Hit is an incredibly fun and challenging arcade game that tests your precision and timing. The objective is simple: throw all your available knives into the spinning wooden log or boss target to break it and proceed to the next level. 

Key Features:
- Addictive One-Tap Gameplay: Easy to learn controlsâ€”just tap to throw the knife.
- Challenging Stages: Progress through stages with increasing difficulty. (e.g., 'STAGE 1')
- Boss Battles: Every few stages, face a unique, moving boss target with obstacles (like 'BOSS : LID') for special challenges and rewards.
- Collect Apples: Hit the apples attached to the log or boss to earn currency.
- Unlock New Blades: Use your collected apples in the shop to unlock a large variety of over 20 unique knives and swords. (Screenshots show a selection screen).
- High Score System: Aim for the highest stage count to prove your throwing skills.
